snippet: A new work from the playwright Chiori Miyagawa and a stage version of Flann O’Brien’s surreal crime novel “The Third Policeman” are part of La MaMa’s new season.
abstract: A new work from the playwright Chiori Miyagawa and a stage version of Flann O’Brien’s surreal crime novel “The Third Policeman” are part of La MaMa’s new season.

headline.main: La MaMa Announces Its Fall Season
